document.description: <customer> <Name>Wal-Mart Stores, Inc.</Name> <Description>Wal-Mart Stores, Inc. (Walmart), operates retail stores in various formats globally. The Company operates in three segments: the Walmart U.S., the Walmart International and the Sam�s Club. During the fiscal year ended January 31, 2013 (fiscal 2013), its Walmart U.S. segment accounted for approximately 59% of its net sales and operated retail stores in various formats in all 50 states in the United States and Puerto Rico, as well as Walmart�s online retail operations, walmart.com. Its Walmart International segment consists of retail operations in 26 countries. The Walmart International segment includes a range of formats of retail stores, restaurants, Sam�s Clubs and online retail operations, which operate outside the United States. Its Sam�s Club segment consists of membership warehouse clubs operated in 47 states in the United States and Puerto Rico, as well as the segment�s online retail operations, samsclub.com. Effective February 24, 2014, Wal-Mart Stores Inc acquired Yumprint.</Description> <emailPostFix>@fake.walmart.com</emailPostFix> <website>http://www.walmart.com</website> <address>702 Southwest 8th Street</address> <city>Bentonville</city> <state>Arkansas</state> <zip>72716</zip> <country>United States of America</country> <stockTicker>WMT</stockTicker> <industry>Retail</industry> </customer>
